It's too dark for my kid to watch which to be honest none of the other movies have had people on fire getting impaled every other second...I just don't care it didn't even hook me we got an hour and a half in and we're like thank god we didn't pay for it and or waste time getting a sitter...we're going to play a drinking game and take shots when we get bored because I have to finish it because MARVEL I am really hopefully for love and thunder in a week because at least taika watiti can direct a movie I'll like....

Author: meettamakuwala
Review_Title: Small, but with creative visual effects
Review: Must watch for Marvel fans. One time watchable for rest of other. Simple Story, Amazing VFX, small runtime.

Author: l_i_a
Review: I definitely was not expecting the little horror elements (The Red Witch in the tunnel made the whole salon jump in their seats) and that was cool - it switched things up a bit. But the storyline felt rushed, especially the last convo between Strange and the then-multiverse Kristine was a bit odd. Overall i think i liked the first movie more. Looking forward to Strange #3.

Author: brianyang-73578
Review: Interesting concepts and ideas, but the storyline is all over the place. It keeps viewers wondering whether it is a marvel comic show or a horror movie.

Author: scehall
Review: To much time focused on social issues of today and not enough actual story and character development, it's hard to watch a movie that can just randomly kill off characters and no one really cares.

Author: swissley
Review_Title: If MCU was made in the 90's.
Review: Worth a watch but don't expect high quality. It felt like a over-hyped 90's superhero miniseries more than a continuation of a complicated cinematic universe. It had cheesey CGI monster battles and predictable dialogue. I'm glad I didn't pay to see it in the theater.

Author: wbronk
Review_Title: I understand why Feige was pissed at marketing. Great movie, but...
Review: Okay, so I really loved this one except for a few issues. The big one being, yes the marketing team pretty much spoiled every cameo, except for maybe one or two, completely shattering expectations. I kept thinking, "wow! If they're showing us these characters in the trailers, they must have bigger surprises in store!" I know it was almost impossible to live up to the hype, but still... for a company that basically reinvented, and monopolized the "cinematic universe" to do a Marvel Multi-verse movie, this seems like a wasted opportunity to me. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely loved it! But they had such a great chance to deliver so much more than what we got. With a multi-versal movie like this, we could have gotten so many more characters (old, new, and even one-offs) without the expectation of seeing them again. I really wanted to see a fight ala Ultron vs The Watcher in What If..? Where they're just crashing through universes, falling into quick battle shots of other characters. I absolutely blame the marketing team! But it was still one hell of a ride!

Author: hazimelmohasseb
Review: To be honest the best thing about the movie is Wanda and her turning evil; hell i even wanted her to win at some time. The sequence of her killing the members of the illuminati was just amazing, i mean who doesn't like a savage Scarlet Witch. I also liked the horror theme that Raimi introduced to the movie.

Author: ankitgautam-18549
Review_Title: WANDA MADNESS INSTEAD OF MULTIVERSE MADNESS
Review: *Overall the Movie was good but being a Marvel fan I felt it would be better if it's run time was more than 2 hrs. Marvel is making very simple stories now. There wasn't a proper character development. This movie has horror vibes than being a Marvel Dr. Strange, feels like I was watching a Evil dead type movie. And the last thing which I found very dramatic how Wanda easily kills illuminati..!*

Author: boubekrinassim
Review: The movie is another beautiful piece by Marvel yet leaves you hungry and expecting. You would want more and seek a deeper impact. The concept of the Multiverse "touched" beautifully but creates many questions and some scenes leave you wonder what is next.

Review: No comment necessary. Storyline, acting were horrible. Graphics were solid, only reason it got a one star

Author: krnfx
Review: I am a huge fan of the MCU(also Dr Strange 1) and a loyal user of IMDB. I have not WRITTEN A SINGLE COMMENT about any movie until now. Dr Strange in the multiverse of madness is just a 127 mins of visual effects with poor plots and cringe moments.

Author: Nathan_Howell_
Review_Title: A Very 'Strange' and Almost Confusing Addition to the MCU.
Review: To start, if you're a Marvel fan and you're debating seeing this movie, you absolutely should. The good parts of this movie feel like a fun, classic, and action-packed Marvel movie, but they are overshadowed by confusing pacing, forced fan-service and inconsistent themes.
